aka: You Can't Live With Your Mouth Shut
trans_title: You Can't Live With Your Mouth Shut
introduction: Mano Mendi lives in Santiago, one of the Cape verde islands, situated 500km off the west coast of Africa. He is the last player of cimboa, a one-string violin used to accompany the traditional batuque music. His music is beginning to attract the interest of outsiders, such as Tó, a music teacher from the capital city Praia.
